sourcesContent:
{{ title }}

Learn multiplication tables the fun way!

{{ number }} × {{ i + 1 }} = {{ result }} Click to reveal
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'NeumericTable'; number: number = 0; tableArray: number[] = []; shownResults: Set = new Set(); generateTable() { this.tableArray = []; this.shownResults.clear(); for(let i = 1; i <= 10; i++) { this.tableArray.push(i * this.number); } } toggleResult(index: number) { if (this.shownResults.has(index)) { this.shownResults.delete(index); } else { this.shownResults.add(index); } } }
